quote_first:
I filled her in on the weekend’s events, and she paled when I told her about the gunshot. “Thank the Lord you weren’t hurt.”
We discussed the incident a few minutes longer, and then I noticed the time.
title: No Cats Allowed
author: Miranda James

quote_last: and the sun was fiercer every minute.
title: Burmese Days
author: George Orwell

quote_first: It was Mrs. Poppets that woke me up next morning. She said: “Do you know that it’s
quote_last:
, sir?”
“Nine o’ what?” I cried, starting up.
“Nine o’clock,” she replied, through the keyhole. “I thought you was a- oversleeping yourselves.”
title: Three Men in a Boat
author: Jerome K. Jerome
